explains: n. 混战，冲突；混乱的人群或事物

sentences.en: A policeman was killed and scores of people were injured in the melee.
sentences.cn: 混战中一名警察被打死，许多人受伤。

sentences.en: The melee lasted into the early morning.
sentences.cn: 双方混战持续至翌日凌晨。

sentences.en: They counter melee heroes and fragile ranged ones.
sentences.cn: 他们克制团战英雄和其他脆弱的远程英雄。
